data.text: Namni Waaqayyo cubbuu itti hin lakkoofne,
Yeroo ani cubbuu koo himachuu dhiisetti,
Harki kee halkanii fi guyyaa natti ulfaateeraatii;
Ergasiis cubbuu koo sitti nan himadhe;
Ati iddoo ani itti dhokadhuu dha;
Ani karaa ati irra deemtu irratti sin qajeelcha; sin barsiisas;
Dhiphinni namoota hamoo baay ºee dha;
Yaa qajeeltota, isin Waaqayyotti gammadaa; ililchaas;
